title: Organizational Learning Design Through Market Knowledge: A Mathematics-Based Project Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical and data analysis skills, general understanding of organizational operations
context.additional_context: Collaborative Learning Environment Applying Real Cases from Local Public Institutions/Nonprofits to Mathematical Modeling

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically interpret market data (competitor/customer analysis) and propose methods to integrate it into organizational learning processes
Learners can form PBL teams to analyze regional institutional cases and design data-driven decision-making processes
Learners can implement the stages of market knowledge acquisition-diffusion-application through mathematical models (statistics/optimization) to develop performance prediction strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
